reviewText: Wasnt supposed to be sold in the US. We changed the settings to watch it and now it cant be watched again!!! Unacceptable!!
Nothing! Not formatted for American Dvd
It didn't work in a DVD player or blue Ray player. Plus I felt that it was over priced.
Had an attachment on the movie that said  it wouldn't play in most of americas DVD players.  I intend to return it.
Not able to be viewed on an American DVD player and it was never mentioned before I purchased it. I had to return it
